title: Add a switch for the main contextmenu inside the developer tools
body:
The main context menu for a website is very minimal, but...
E.g. here: "Select all" "insert" AND "inspect element" and "show source".
This is maybe good for developers, but most edge users are no developers and this both entries are pointless and maybe confusing.
In my opinion there should be a switch in the F12 Tools, or at another place, that enable and disable this both context menu entries.
